thread.title: Elizabeth Hurley Bares Her Body For Bikini Bike Ride
thread.title_full: Elizabeth Hurley Bares Her Body For Bikini Bike Ride

author: Stephen Andrew
title: Elizabeth Hurley Bares Her Body For Bikini Bike Ride
text:
Elizabeth Hurley Bares Her Body For Bikini Bike Ride Stephen Andrew Back to Article Image of 
When one thinks of getting ready for going for a bike ride, they might imagine just throwing on some shorts and a t-shirt, maybe some tennis shoes, and taking off. Elizabeth Hurley, however, does pretty much everything sexier than everyone else , so when she goes for a bike ride, she's nothing less than stunning. 
A post shared by Elizabeth Hurley (@elizabethhurley1) on Feb 25, 2017 at 10:18am PST 
The Bedazzled actress stunned in a two-piece striped bikini , mostly hidden beneath a sheer white top that showed off just enough cleavage to be risqu√©. 
Having taken a bit of a break from the big screen, Hurley took on a role in E!'s soap opera style drama The Royals back in 2013 and the show began airing in 2015. The season three finale recently aired, and it was announced that the show had been picked up for a fourth season by the network. 
A post shared by Elizabeth Hurley (@elizabethhurley1) on Feb 18, 2017 at 9:12am PST 
A post shared by Elizabeth Hurley (@elizabethhurley1) on Feb 15, 2017 at 6:44am PST 
Once heralded as the most beautiful woman in the world based on the flawless symmetry of her facial features, Elizabeth Hurley shows absolutely no signs of slowing down or fading beauty. 
A post shared by Elizabeth Hurley (@elizabethhurley1) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:53am PST
